title: Ixion Saga DT
original_name: イクシオン サーガ DT
opening_song: #1: "DT Suteru (DT 捨テル)" by Golden Ixion Bomber DT (eps 1-12)
ending_song: #1: "Let's Go ED (レッツゴー ED)" by Golden Ixion Bomber DT (eps 2-12)
sinopse: The game and anime follow Kon Hokaze, a boy who embarks on a journey from our world to an alternate world known as Mira, which is full a mysterious energy known as Alma. After saving Princess Ecarlate from attackers, he soon finds himself in the middle of a struggle around Alma.
